# selectedScopeButtonIndex

**Instance Property**

The index of the selected scope button.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var selectedScopeButtonIndex: Int { get set }
```

## Discussion

The indexes of the scope buttons are determined by the indexes of the strings in [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISearchBar/scopeButtonTitles].

## Configuring scope bar buttons

- **scopeButtonTitles**: An array of strings indicating the titles of the scope buttons.
- **showsScopeBar**: Specifies whether the scope bar is displayed.
- **setShowsScope(_:animated:)**: Specifies whether the scope bar is displayed, optionally using an animation.
